channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Redwire and the power that’ll fuel NASA’s Gateway Lunar Space Station

item.title: I’m Working in an Office Again, and It Hasn’t Changed My Mind About RTO
item.description: This is what happens when the office is a resource, not a tool of control.

item.title: Bears Quarterback Caleb Williams Gave a Master Class in Leadership and Perseverance
item.description: Williams’ unflinching perseverance that has truly set him apart and provided a blueprint for navigating adversity.

item.title: Vail Resorts is having a very dry year: It reported a record‑low snowpack, forcing the company to lower its 2026 earnings outlook
item.description: Vail Resorts is having a very dry year: It reported a record‑low snowpack, forcing the company to lower its 2026 earnings outlook.

item.title: ‘We are Jerome Powell’: Gen Z finds an unlikely meme hero in the Fed chair via AI songs and fan edits
item.description: After refusing to bend to political pressure, Fed chair Jerome Powell is now the latest heartthrob.

item.title: 3 Principles That Have Shaped My Best Business Relationships
item.description: The most valuable business relationships don’t start with a pitch. They start with intention.

item.title: Latin American Startups Are Starting to Scale—Here’s What That Means for the U.S. Economy
item.description: Latin America’s shift from startups to scale-ups is producing leaner competitors, and U.S. founders should be paying attention.

item.title: This 3‑Word Marketing Rule Helped Turn Bilt Into a $10.75B Company, According to Founder Ankur Jain

item.title: Jensen Huang tells Stanford students their high expectations may make it hard for them to succeed: ‘I wish upon you ample doses of pain and suffering’

item.title: Adaptability is the new job security and 4 more future AI trends from EY’s global chief innovation officer
item.description: As we begin a new year, there are five AI trends shaping C-suite conversations. Each one represents enormous opportunities and challenges.
